backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles with access control, supporting fetch/save operations and score updates.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module passing through userProfiles without transforming data.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list of short summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app handling auth state, profile loading, routing, and view selection.
frontend/src/auth/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/auth/ProfileSetupModal.tsx: Profile creation modal sending initial user profile with optional fields encoded correctly.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary displaying a fatal error screen and allowing reload.
frontend/src/components/AppFatalErrorScr: Full-screen fatal error UI with reload and logout options.
frontend/src/game/controls/useKeyboardDr: Tracks keyboard input for steering, braking, and boosting, returning simple control state values.
frontend/src/game/controls/useTiltSteeri: Provides device-tilt steering input with an enable toggle and clamped tilt values.
frontend/src/game/garage/carLibrary.ts: Defines car variant data and exports a static list of available cars.
frontend/src/game/garage/GarageView.tsx: Renders the 3D garage scene with car preview, selection UI, and race start controls.
Zustand store managing selected car index with persistence and next/previous navigation.
frontend/src/game/persistence/useHighSco: Manages high score storage, using backend profile if authenticated or localStorage otherwise.
frontend/src/game/RaceView.tsx: Race screen rendering the 3D scene, HUD, overlays, and pause handling.
frontend/src/game/scene/CameraRig.tsx: Smoothly follows a target with camera shake effects based on boosting or drifting.
frontend/src/game/scene/CarModel.tsx: Renders a simple car model with configurable colors and optional headlights.
frontend/src/game/scene/effects/BoostTra: Displays animated glowing boost trails behind the car using mesh opacity changes.
frontend/src/game/scene/effects/RainEffe: Simulates falling rain particles repositioned around the player as they move.
frontend/src/game/scene/Environment.tsx: Renders road, sky backdrop, and side barriers using repeating textures.
frontend/src/game/scene/LightingRig.tsx: Adjusts directional and ambient lighting based on time-of-day progression.
Renders coin and nitro pickup objects with lighting based on simulation data.
frontend/src/game/scene/RaceScene.tsx: Main race scene combining physics, AI, visuals, effects, and camera behavior.
frontend/src/game/sim/constants.ts: Defines physics, nitro, day-night, and scoring constants used throughout the simulation.
frontend/src/game/sim/dayNight.ts: Updates time-of-day progression and determines whether the scene is in night mode.
frontend/src/game/sim/progress.ts: Exports a helper to determine race position based on Z coordinates.
frontend/src/game/sim/scoring.ts: Tracks score via Zustand and triggers race finish when the player crosses the finish line.
frontend/src/game/sim/useCarPhysics.ts: Simulates car movement, steering, drifting, and grip using inputs, weather, nitro, and selected car stats.
frontend/src/game/sim/useNitro.ts: Manages nitro boost state, depletion, regeneration, and boost activation via keyboard input.
frontend/src/game/sim/usePickups.ts: Generates coin and nitro pickups and handles collision-based scoring and nitro refills.
frontend/src/game/sim/useRaceTimer.ts: Maintains and updates the race timer each frame unless paused.
frontend/src/game/sim/useRivalAI.ts: Moves a rival car forward with slight sinusoidal lateral motion.
frontend/src/game/sim/useSpeedometer.ts: Derives the player's speed in km/h from car physics.
frontend/src/game/sim/weather.ts: Randomly toggles rain state over time, affecting game physics elsewhere.
frontend/src/game/state/gameState.ts: Zustand store managing game view, race status, and transitions like start, pause, finish, and restart.
frontend/src/game/ui/ControlsHelp.tsx: UI component showing a toggleable controls help panel.
frontend/src/game/ui/FinishOverlay.tsx: Displays end‑of‑race results, high score logic, and actions to restart or return to garage.
frontend/src/game/ui/HUD.tsx: Shows in‑race HUD including score, high score, position, time, speed, and nitro bar.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseOverlay.tsx: Pause screen with options to resume, restart, or return to garage.
frontend/src/game/ui/StartOverlay.tsx: Start screen prompting the user to begin the race.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains a backend actor tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity, creating AuthClient instances and exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to load and save the caller's user profile using the actor API and optional Candid normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining CSS variables for light/dark modes and custom utilities like text shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Utility helpers for converting optional Candid values to/from consistent TypeScript representations, including bigint normalization.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash-query handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Unity-based game prototype, features, issues, and requirement tracking.
